t: r/amazon on Reddit: Missing a piece from an item I ordered
Customer Issue - Model set with missing parts?
s: Politely advise the buyer returns for a full refund as the item has sold out as you are required by Amazon to follow their set procedure. Apologise for the manufacturing defect as the item was sealed, which must be the cause, unless the missing piece has been misplaced at the customers home.

t: Find a Missing Item from Your Amazon Order - Amazon Customer Service
s: Double check to confirm that the part is missing from the product packaging. If you can’t find it, contact the product's manufacturer for assistance. Manufacturer contact information can be found on the product packaging, in the paperwork included with the product, or by searching the Internet.

t: Amazon.com: Customer Questions & Answers
s: If bought new, it will come with all you need. Mine was missing a part and bolt which they sent. If "used" it may be missing a part.

t: Replace a Damaged, Defective, or Broken Item - Amazon Customer Service
s: The replacement order may be shipped only after you ship the original item(s) back to Amazon. We recommend you to ship back the original item(s) as soon as you request a replacement. ... For different product support options offered by Amazon, visit Get Product Support. Missing an item?

t: Item missing/damaged from Amazon order? Steps to quickly contact support to get a replacement
s: October 18, 2020 - Items are missing or damaged from your Amazon order? Here are how you can contact Customer Support to get replacement items. It's very easy to contact the support and they are super fast in resolving the issues

t: Amazon
s: Sorry that you had an issue with your order. The simplest and quickest method for resolving this issue is to request a return (missing pieces). The Seller should either authorize the return and provide a prepaid label of issue a full refund (within 48 hours), they might offer to send the pieces.

t: What should you do if your Amazon package is missing one of the items you ordered? - Quora
s: Answer (1 of 10): I’ve had that happen just once. What I did was contact the seller and explain I order 2 of X, and received 1 of X. t: Amazon
s: However, you can deduct up to 100% for loss of value if the item is no longer re-sellable at full price (damaged or incomplete etc). Not sure about the payment or reimbursement of return costs but you may be liable to pay them, upfront by means of a paid label or a return address in Spain.

t: Find a Missing Item from Your Package - Amazon Customer Service
s: If you've received a package and an item from your order is missing, the item may have been shipped separately. Check Your Orders.

t: Missing some of the items sent to Amazon warehouse
s: I sent in a shipment containing 16 different handmade items. I received a message that there were 6 missing items. I opened up an investigation. They found 3 of the items but were still missing the other 3 items. Now they are requesting a packing slip from the shipment.

t: Anyone purchased from Amazon Warehouse Deals? | Tom's Hardware Forum

s: I shipped a new product, Customer returned 2 days after getting it and states missing parts. When I received the item , the parts have clearly broken off and should have been there.
